Title: Letters from War
Writer: Ivo Ferreira, António Lobo Antunes (novel), Edgar Medina
Actors: Miguel Nunes, Margarida Vila-Nova, Ricardo Pereira, João Pedro Vaz
Plot: Based on António Lobo Antunes's novel, a collection of letters written by a young soldier, doctor and a aspirant writer, to his wife while he was serving in Angola between 1971 and 1973, during the Portuguese Colonial War, a war between Portugal with its former overseas provinces.
